greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Smallest number k such that A049559(k) / A187730(k) = n.
comment: For every n, a(n)-1 is not squarefree.
link: Amiram Eldar, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..450
mathematica: a[n_]:= Block[{k=1}, While[GCD[k - 1, EulerPhi[k]]/GCD[CarmichaelLambda[k], k - 1] != n, k++]; k]; Table[a[n], {n, 40}] (* _Indranil Ghosh_, Mar 27 2017 *)
program: (PARI) a(n)={my(k=1); while(gcd(k - 1, eulerphi(k))/gcd(lcm(znstar(k)[2]),k - 1) != n, k++); k}; \\ _Indranil Ghosh_, Mar 27 2017
results.author: _Thomas Ordowski_ and _Altug Alkan_, Mar 27 2017
